titleStmt.title: A perfect pathway to felicitie conteining godly meditations and praiers, fit for all times, and necessarie to be practized of all good Christians.
titleStmt.author: Stubbes, Phillip.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Yardly for Humfrey Lownes,

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: A short treatise of praiers and supplications.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
